page.title: 13Language
page.content: Although English is the predominant language of the town the Welsh language can be heard on the streets and in the shops. The majority of those people who speak Welsh are the senior section of the population,that is those people who moved into the town from the country. The schools have a bilingual policy, and specialist teachers are employed to travel from school to school to aid classroom teachers. Many of the schoolchildren can understand simple instructions in Welsh but only a few can hold a prolonged conversation in Welsh.
